channel.title: Need help asap! plz

item.title: Need help asap! plz
item.dc:creator: @killershand6 killershand6
item.description:
@killershand6 wrote:

alright, heres wht i need help withâ€¦when i try to give my npc some dialog it works but then my last bit of my code it he wont say it at all.

	[code=]case 411:
		sendNpcChat4("Hello there "+c.playerName+"!"," You look like an adventurer to me","Want to try out my minigame?","You will need to..", c.talkingNpc, "Crone");
		c.nextChat = 421;
	break;
	case 421:
		sendNpcChat4("Get a crystle key or more!"," Once you are there","you will need to look for a chest","you will then use the key on it and claim 3 prizes.", c.talkingNpc, "Crone");
		c.nextChat = 431;
	break;
	case 431:
		sendOption2("I am ready to go", "I dont wanna die");
		c.dialogueAction = 63;[/code]

here that part is and heres this

} else if(c.dialogueAction == 63) { if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(989, 1)) { c.sendMessage("you don't have a key to get the reward"); c.getPA().removeAllWindows(); break; } c.getPA().movePlayer(5, 5, 0); c.sendMessage("I highly doubt you will make it out alive!");

and idk why it wont give me the option to tele some where need help plz(:
